column1: Saint-Ouen-sur-Seine (French pronunciation: ​[sɛ̃t‿wɛ̃ syʁ sɛn]) is a commune in the Seine-Saint-Denis department in the Île-de-France region of France. It is located in the northern suburbs of Paris
column2: 6.6 kilometres (4.1 miles) from the centre of Paris. The commune was officially called Saint-Ouen until 2018
column3: when its name was changed by ministerial order.The communes neighbouring Saint-Ouen-sur-Seine are Paris
column10: and Saint-Denis to the east. The commune of Saint-Ouen-sur-Seine is part of the canton of Saint-Ouen
column11: which also includes L'Île-Saint-Denis and part of Épinay-sur-Seine. Saint-Ouen also includes the Cimetière de Saint-Ouen.

column2: the city of Paris was enlarged by annexing neighbouring communes. On that occasion
column3: a part of the commune of Saint-Ouen was annexed to the city of Paris. At the same time
column4: the commune of La Chapelle-Saint-Denis was disbanded and divided between the city of Paris
column7: and Aubervilliers. Saint-Ouen received a small part of the territory of La Chapelle-Saint-Denis. The commune of Montmartre was also disbanded; the city of Paris annexed most of Montmartre
column8: but Saint-Ouen did receive a small northern part of the territory of that commune.

column1: Saint-Ouen-sur-Seine is home to Paris' flea market
column2: the highest concentration of antique dealers and second-hand furniture dealers in the world.. The flea market (marché aux puces) is held every Saturday
column4: and Monday; because of this high frequency
column6: it has tended to consist only of professionals who rent their spot for a minimum term of three years. In 2014 the flea market site was acquired by Jean-Cyrille Boutmy from Gerald Grosvenor

column1: Saint-Ouen-sur-Seine is served by two stations on Paris Métro Line 13: Garibaldi and Mairie de Saint-Ouen.
From 2020 it will also be connected at Mairie de Saint-Ouen to the extended Gare Saint Lazare to Olympiades Paris Metro Line 14.
Saint-Ouen-sur-Seine is also served by Saint-Ouen station on Paris RER line C.
3 school groups of preschools and primary schools

column2: an accredited mechanical engineering school is located in the Vieux Saint Ouen quarter. It was created in 1948
column3: is member of the university of Paris-Seine and now part of the ISAE Group
column4: which has a total of 6000 students.
